title: Enhancing Customer Service Competencies: Foundations of Vehicle Detection and Tracking Technology: Deep Learning Based on STMap

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of STMap-based vehicle detection technology
Learners can comparatively explain the roles of U-Net architecture and attention mechanisms
Learners can understand evaluation methods for vehicle tracking performance under various weather conditions (rain/snow/low light)
Learners can describe the process of implementing baseline models using public datasets and open-source tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
